name: Trog Smash Island
description:
The little dinosaur and his friends are trying to escape from an island full of troglodytes. Help them to smash as many trogs as possible, and unleash their hidden power by collecting all the pineapples you find along the way.

RUN, JUMP AND SMASH!
Play the game using only one finger: tap to jump, and tap again to smash the trogs! Easy to learn, but hard to master!

UNLEASH THE POWER
The little dinosaur and his friends are adorable creatures. But they are able to transform into invincible super beasts!

UNLOCK ALL THE CHARACTERS
Reach the top and collect pineapples to get the 12 characters and enjoy the adventure.

ENJOY THE GAME
Enjoy the beautiful pixel art graphics, the fluid animations, and the retro-sounding music.
